description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a. Physical description: 16 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords; marginal notes. Occasional staining. Origin: 2 Shaʻbān 1191 H [5 September 1777] (leaf 62b). Incipit: الحمد لله ... فيقول ... الحسين المدعو بخليفة السلطان ... اني قد کتبت حين مطالعة کتاب معالم الدين
author: Sulṭān al-ʻUlamāʼ, Ḥusayn ibn Rafīʻ, -1654?
abstract: Commentary on Ibn al-Shahīd al-Thānī's Maʻālim al-dīn wa-malādhdh al-mujtahidīn, a treatise on uṣūl al-fiqh.
extent: 62 leaves : paper ; 163 x 96 (121 x 58) mm bound to 163 x 100 mm
title: Sulṭān bar Maʻālim janāb Shaykh Ḥasan ibn janāb Shahīd al-Thānī.
creator: سلطان العلماء، حسين بن رفيع، -1654?
subject: Ibn al-Shahīd al-Thānī, al-Ḥasan, 1551 or 1552-1602 or 1603—Maʻālim al-dīn wa-malādhdh al-mujtahidīn.
binding_note: Limp brown leather with blind-stamped central mandorla and pendants and blind-tooled fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
